When you use abilities you will generate points for your combo meter (Bar under health)
Once it fills, it will increase your combo rank by 1 (maximum of 3)

Before you choose an ability, you can open the 'Non-ability Actions' menu and select 'Empower'. Based on your combo, your ability will gain bonus attributes.

For this scenario, the enemy you are fighting will be immune to damage until you empower an ability. Use the abilities at your disposal to defeat them.
